description: SoulPrint builds a personal identity layer that upgrades every AI you use.\nYour tone. Your patterns. Your cognitive rhythm — carried with you, encrypted and under your control.
A deep, personality-level profile that learns how you speak, think, and create — so every AI responds in your voice, not default mode.
Use ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, Perplexity. Anything.\nYour SoulPrint travels with you and upgrades every model instantly.
Your data stays with you. Encrypted on your device.\nNothing leaves your hands unless you choose it.
Your AI adapts to your mood, goals, tone, and pace bringing out your best thinking and your true voice.
